instances.context: This is a part of the application in which a picture has been taken and there are instructions on how to discard or recycle the main object in the picture in the most sustainable way possible.

input.content: What's the best way to dispose a cardboard box?

messages.author: user
messages.content: How can I discard a dog?

messages.author: bot
messages.content: !. Dogs are not disposable, take a picture of an object.

messages.author: user
messages.content: How can I discard a cat?

messages.author: bot
messages.content: !. Cats are not disposable, take a picture of an object.
